about_the_game:
Play as a living legend

Live the dream and play as the one and only, Danny Trejo! Including the complete model, special clothing and weapon. Master the island and hear the cheers of millions as you put the bad in badass.

Key features:


  • Complete character model - A complete player model of Danny Trejo adaptable to all body types and adorned with his legendary tattoos.
  • Voice acted actions and taunts - The unmistakeable voice of Danny Trejo will be yours, with a complete voice pack recorded by a true legend. Try out some taunts to really put your rivals in their place.
  • Special clothing - Inspired by the incredible back catalogue of Danny Trejo, you’ll be sure to land on the island in style.
  • The legendary machete - One of the most iconic weapons of the popular culture is here, and dropping with its rightful owner. Whether you need it for crafting or 'disagreements’ with other prisoners, it will never fail you.

content_descriptors.notes: The game allows nudity but has an option to turn it off. It features alcohol and some drugs.
